      • formatTime

        public static final java.lang.String formatTime(long milliseconds,
                                                java.lang.String format)
        Formats a time string. d: days h: hour in am/pm format (1-12) H: hour of day (0-23) m: minute in hour (0-59) s: second in minute (0-59) z: millisecond in second (0-999) t(h|m|s|z): total. "tm" would give the total minutes You can pad with 0's by repeating the letter. For h, H, m, and s the max padding is 2. For z it is 3. For d, th, tm, ts, and tz it is unlimited.
        Parameters:
        milliseconds -
        format -
        Returns:
        the formatted time
